review.title: “AbsolutData ensures a good variety of work and fast growth if you love challenges.”
review.pros: Pros – If you are a person who is interested in Analytics and want to challenge yourself, AbsolutData is a very good bet. It promises you fast growth if you can prove yourself, and gives you wide experience in expanding your analytics as well as people management skills over time. It is a pretty young company and that is the best part - you will enjoy working here. Young people who want to prove themselves - for the majority, it is their first or second jobs. Very friendly atmosphere - people are not competitive, and are willing to help one other out. You will settle in very fast within the team.There is also a recent emphasis on increasing employee engagement - the company organizes various events within to increase bonding between and within teams. All in all, a great place to work with.
review.cons: Cons – Still very unstructured, which is not upto everyone's liking. Not a very flat organization, which I consider a hinderance. In some teams, work life balance is an issue, though the company is taking steps to balance it. Little organizational administrative support - parking and cabs remain issues which the company has been unable to assuage the company of. Presently going through plenty of changes, which is leading to growth pangs.Plenty of attrition and less robust knowledge transfer sharing systems.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Active steps to counter work-life balance problem. Provide more organizational administrative support. Try following companies like Google and Amex. Trust people more, and you can probably save up on high salary costs. People should be ready to work for you if you create a friendler atmosphere inside work. Moreover, need to have more structured mechanisms for tackling problems.
review.recommended: – I'm optimistic about the outlook for this company
